categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: Jedi Mickey's Starfighter was the personal customized Eta-2 Actis-class interceptor of the Jedi Master Mickey Mouse and his astromech droid partner, R2-MK. Mickey and R2-MK used Jedi Mickey's Starfighter to battle droid starfighters and Imperial TIE Fighter squadrons.

Jedi Mickey's Starfighter was first released as a Hasbro Star Wars: Star Tours multi-figure toy pack as part of the 2013 edition of Star Wars Weekends, an annual Star Wars festival hosted at Disney's Hollywood Studios theme park of the Walt Disney World Resort. The vehicle pack, which also includes Jedi Mickey and R2-MK action figure accessories, is sold exclusively at Disney Parks.
